example.text: Protecting Michiganders from M ore Audits Last week, I voted for legislation that would eliminate the $80 billion in funding that Democrats gave to the IRS in their partisan spending spree last year. President Biden talks about wanting to go after the wealthy but the reality is his plan would increase audits on low-income and middle-class Michigan families .
This is a bipartisan bill I am leading with fellow Michigander, Congresswoman Debbie Dingell. It would require the VA to increase the number of patient advocates available to serve veterans.

News from Congressman John Moolenaar This year, my team and I have helped hundreds of Michigan residents when they needed help with a federal agency. We helped them cut through the red tape and get a resolution.
A company that pledges allegiance to the CCP should not be receiving your tax dollars! Do you think your tax dollars should be used to bring a CCP-affiliated company to Mecosta County?

The Senate should pass this bill immediately. Sincerely, John EMAIL UPDATE By subscribing to my email updates, you are authorizing me to send regular email updates from my office to your email account.

Banning Federal Oil Sales to China I also voted for legislation last week that would make it illegal for companies owned by the Chinese government to buy oil sold at auction from our nation's Strategic Petroleum Reserve. This legislation passed the House with massive bipartisan support in a 331-97 vote, as 218 Republicans and 113 Democrats voted in support.
